name: 林鳳儀
objective:
本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。另外，為了讓企業經理人了解衍生性金融商品，本課程亦以深入淺出方式介紹選擇權之基本觀念、交易實務與決策應用。本課程目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識，培育理論與實務兼備之財務管理人才

The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. In addition, in order to let corporate managers understand the derivatives, this course introduces the basic concept of option, transaction practice and decision-making applications. The purpose of this course is to provides knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value, so as to cultivate financial management talents with both theoretical knowledge and practical skills.
schedule:
1 課程內容與財務管理概論

6 風險與報酬
7 衍生性商品與選擇權介紹
8 選擇權與認購權證市場之運作
9 股票選擇權的特質
10 選擇權交易策略
11 股票選擇權之評價：BSM 模型
12 員工股票選擇權
13 財務報告之比率與分析
14 資本預算－評估方法
15 資本結構與財務困難
16 股利政策
17 營運資金管理
18 權益融資與上市櫃
